attributes.action: Stop homework from being given to pupils in schools.
attributes.additional_details: Also, homework is usually not helpful towards a child's education. The homework set by most teachers doesn't teach or reinforce their knowledge of the subject.
attributes.background: In schools homework puts a lot of pressure on students. It uses up their free time away from stress. After a day of school, being tired and burnt out, they might struggle to complete the homework to the right quality.
